summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges for two shipments, including transportation and special handling fees, totaling $37.02. The invoice also includes information about discounts applied and payment due date.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 22, 2005, and is addressed to Jeffrey Epstein.
Total charges for the services rendered amount to $37.02.
Two shipments were picked up on August 15, 2005, and delivered on August 16 and August 18, 2005.
Discounts totaling $58.66 were applied to the invoice.
Several recipients are mentioned, including Manuela Sottler, Hasan Tehan, Peter Cheever, and Manuela Shotter.
